## Auditor interface

Logs audit events scoped to the current request.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Auditor 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [add(decorateEvent, args)](./kibana-plugin-core-server.auditor.add.md) | Adds an event performed by the user to the audit log. |
